name: Forklift Frenzy
description:
Project for Ludum Dare 42

"W A S D" Keys  OR Arrow Keys to Move.
F Key OR Space Bar to raise/lower forklift.

Pallets (Wood, Iron, and Bricks) arrive at regular intervals, and must be removed from the loading area. 

Game Over if the Pallets cannot find a loading bay 5 times.

Pallets can be stacked to a height of 2. Reversing will release any Pallet carried if there is another Pallet (or floor) below.

Use the space in the centre for storing Pallets.

Deposit required pallets at the delivery area (Unwanted pallets will block delivery)

Scoring
100 pts per item delivered

Game Over if Pallets cannot be delivered 5 times.
